Text:
Downlading now but as always looks like you've got a lot of great tracks (except for that cover by the klaxons!) and nice to see more Deerhoof! Got a couple of suggestions for you (hope you don't mind!).

Dave House and Boom in the Diamond Industry.

Thanx again Shankly. Good to have you back. Might I suggest a couple of Bluegamba's Choices? Just click my name. I think they make a nice complement to your excellent Children of Love.
Best Regards.

Thanks bdgr and bluegamba - will check out your recommendations (always on the look out for good stuff) - haven't heard of either of your bdgr so am v. interested. 

Keep the recommendations coming!

Hello

Hope you've had a nice vacation. As usual the mix looks really nice, a really good way to find new music.

Noticed that you missed out on testa rosa's self titled debut. I'd reccomend that you give them a listen!
http://www.myspace.com/testarosamusic
Shankly - Dave House has done a couple of collaborations with Jenny Owen Youngs (who has done a fantastic cover of Hot In Herre).

Nice work as usual Shankly!

Any chance you could add some id3 tagging that makes it easy to group your stuff in iTunes?

'Shankly's Best of [month] [year]' in the 'Grouping' field, maybe?
you can do that for shankly, mr. Appull :-D
